channel.title: netbsd on Simone Vellei Blog
channel.description: Recent content in netbsd on Simone Vellei Blog

item.title: NetBSD on a ROCK64 Board
item.description: This is the sequel to the previous post FreeBSD on a ROCK64 Board. Long story short, I had the chance to resurrect 4 single-board computers that were collecting dust in my office. I decided to install FreeBSD on one of them and it was a success. This time I will show you how and why I installed NetBSD on a second ROCK64 board. Let’s add connectivity to the FreeBSD board The process I described in the previous post was fun and I learned a lot.
